show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

header.title: Integrative Medicine at Beth Israel Medical Center

title: Integrative Medicine at Beth Israel Medical Center
content:
Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, MH, www.drznatually.com, interviews Woodson Merrell, M.D. Dr. <!--more--> Merrell is an integrative physician based in Manhattan and author (with his wife, Kathleen) of Power Up: Unleash Your Natural Energy, Power Up Your Health and Feel 10 Years Younger.
Merrell is chairman of the Department of Integrative Medicine at Beth Israel Medical Center, Manhattan campus of Albert Einstein College of Medicine and an assistant clinical professor of medicine at Columbia University College of Physicians and Surgeons.
Dr Merrell is a founder of iwellville.com.
